game

Class AttackAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      • game.AttackAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActionInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HumanAttackAction, ZombieAttackAction

    public abstract class AttackAction
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    Author:
    Kee Pei Jiin, Tan Wei Li

      • missAttack

        protected abstract java.lang.Boolean missAttack(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weapon)
        Return Boolean which indicates if the actor misses the target
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon used in the attack
        Returns:
        true if the actor misses the target and false otherwise.

      • attackSuccess

        protected abstract void attackSuccess(int damage,
                                      edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                      edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weaponUsed,
                                      edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Operations to be carried out when the attack is success.
        Parameters:
        damage - The damage point the target suffer from the attack.
        actor - The actor performing the attack action.
        weaponUsed - The weapon used in the attack
        map - The map the actor is on.

      • killTarget

        protected abstract void killTarget(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Creates corpse for the target and add the corpse onto the map when the target becomes unconscious, i.e. dead.
        Parameters:
        map - The map the actor is on.

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
                         throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Perform the Action. Only get the first weapon from actor inventory which must always either be short-ranged weapon or intrinsic weapon, if the weapon is not specified in the AttackAction. If miss chance of attack action is specified, use the miss chance. Else, calculate miss chance based on operation in missAttack method. If the damage point is specified, hurt the target using the damage point, else use the damage point of the weapon.
        Specified by:
        execute in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        map - The map the actor is on.
        Returns:
        a description of what happened that can be displayed to the user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor or map argument is null

      • dropCorpseItems

        protected void dropCorpseItems(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        When the target dies, all the items in the target's inventory will be dropped to the ground.
        Parameters:
        map - The map the actor is on.

      • menuDescription

        public java.lang.String menuDescription(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
                                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Describe the action in a format suitable for displaying in the menu.
        Specified by:
        menuDescription in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        Returns:
        A string, e.g. "Human attacks Zombie"
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor is null
        See Also:
        Action.menuDescription(Actor)
